    Society for Mathematical Biology Annual Meeting - 2025

    Edmonton, Canada




    Registration:


    Registration for the annual meeting is now open. Please click the button below to be redirected to the official registration form.

    Register Now

    Early Registration

    Deadline April 30th

    • Regular Member $680CAD
    • Student Member $530CAD
    • Regular Non Member $895CAD
    • Student Non Member $580CAD

    Regular Registration

    After April 30th

    • Regular Member $860CAD
    • Student Member $710CAD
    • Regular Non Member $1075CAD
    • Student Non Member $760CAD


    Included in the price

    • Convention Center venue
    • Wifi provided at the venue for all participants throughout the conference
    • Lunch for five days
    • Coffee and snack breaks each day
    • Dinner and drinks provided at the welcome and Poster reception on Monday evening
    • Public transportation passes (light rail station is located near the venue)
    • We have negotiated excellent hotel rates for the conference. Please see the webpage to book a room. https://2025.smb.org/local-accommodations
    • Note that banquet (Thursday evening) tickets are available for an extra fee when you register


    Optional Extra Charge

    • Banquet $120CAD

    Refund deadline

    June 1st

    We wish to acknowledge that we are located within Treaty 6 territory and Metis Nation of Alberta Region 4. We acknowledge this land as the traditional home for many Indigenous Peoples including the Cree, Blackfoot, Metis, Nakota Sioux, Dene, Saulteaux, Anishinaabe, Inuit and many others whose histories, languages, and cultures continue to influence our vibrant community.
